food.name: Pho bo
food.description: Pho bo Ha Noi nuoc dung dam da, banh pho mem

food.name: Banh mi trung
food.description: Banh mi gion voi trung op la, cha lua va do chua

food.name: Xoi xeo
food.description: Xoi nep thom voi hanh phi, ruoc va da heo

food.name: Banh cuon (Steamed rice rolls)
food.description: Banh banh cuon mem voi nhan thit va nam
